title: Scientific Creativity
content: Born in Istanbul, Candle Elementals is where the precision of science meets the warmth of hand-poured love. Founded by Eda Gaş, we create natural, clean, and ethically crafted soy candles for modern living.

title: Science & Love
content: Every candle is an elemental fusion of science and art, poured by hand with precision. 'Hand-poured with science and love. My goal is to create more than just a candle—it's about a scientific approach to creativity that allows people to reconnect with themselves.'
